rules_text:
Whenever another nontoken permanent you control is returned to hand, you may create a token that's a copy of it. Do this only once each turn.
Each creature card with mana value 3 or less in your hand has ninjutsu {G}{U}. [i]({G}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put that card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
